TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubMenuStyleCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 代表 控制項中 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合中的物件控制項。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in a control. 控制項會使用類別為基礎的資料類型的屬性。The control uses the class as the underlying data type of the property. 屬性會提供其他樣式選項，除了和屬性。The property provides additional style choices in addition to the and properties. 中的第一個樣式集合對應至 [] 功能表中的第一層的子功能表樣式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至子功能表樣式，第二個層級的功能表中，依此類推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the second level of the menu, and so on. 屬性最常用來產生導覽功能表中的，方式如同 Web 站台對應，其中在特定層級的功能表項目應該具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表。The property is most often used to generate a navigation menu, like a Web site map, where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. 類別會繼承其成員的大部分類別。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 如需有關繼承的成員的詳細資訊，請參閱集合。For more information on the inherited members, see the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以指定的子功能表中的樣式設定控制項為基礎的子功能表的層級。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to specify the style settings for the submenus in a control based on the submenu's level. 在此範例中，屬性會傳回物件。In this example, the property returns a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuLevelSubMenuStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelSubMenuStyles/CS/menulevelsubmenustylescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuLevelSubMenuStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelSubMenuStyles/VB/menulevelsubmenustylesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來建立協助程式函式資料類型對應至指定的索引。The method is a helper function that is used to create an of the data type that corresponds to the specified index. 索引通常由使用方法用來建立支援的資料類型，然後搜尋 所需的資料類型的陣列的陣列。The index is often determined by using the method to create an array of supported data types and then searching the array for the desired data type. `index`參數不會用於此方法的實作，且會被忽略。The `index` parameter is not used in this implementation of the method and is ignored. 您應該固定傳入`null`此參數。You should always pass in `null` for this parameter. 方法的這個實作一律會傳回空白物件。This implementation of the method always returns an empty object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法僅供控制項開發人員使用。This method is used only by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來建立所支援的資料類型的陣列的 helper 函式類別。The method is a helper function that is used to create an array of data types supported by the class. 陣列通常會決定所需的資料類型的索引搜尋。The array is often searched to determine the index of a desired data type. 索引會傳遞至方法用來建立對應的資料類型。The index is then passed to the method to create an of the corresponding data type. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法僅供控制項開發人員使用。This method is used only by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果索引是-1，`style`的開頭插入集合。If index is -1, `style` is inserted at the beginning of the collection. 如果索引等於集合中的項目數`style`附加至結尾集合。If index equals the number of items in the collection, `style` is appended to the end of the collection. 方法呼叫加入至集合之前驗證樣式參數。The method is called to validate the style parameter before it is added to the collection. 方法之前呼叫物件插入至集合，而插入物件後，會呼叫方法。The method is called before the object is inserted into the collection, and the method is called after the object is inserted.
